A unique beautiful space in the heart of the FoPo area

Ready in Fall 2019

Owned and operated by a local creative studio, Oblio, the old Decorette building is a creative environment currently looking for tenants to fill a Cafe/Restaurant space and a Retail space. Follow the links below to find more info on each.

UNIT 101

CAFE / RESTAURANT

Permitted for a commercial kitchen with the utilities roughed in, this space already has many of the logistics taken care of.

  • MORE INFO
UNIT 102

RETAIL

A cozy retail space with tall ceilings and a wall of windows. At just under 500 sqft this unit is affordable without sacrificing beauty

  • MORE INFO

COMMON AREAS

In addition to the individual units the building has a shared common space with bathrooms, bike racks and a kitchenette.
